scripts.dev: pnpx concurrently "pnpm --filter=kujob-core dev" "pnpm --filter=kujob-in-memory dev" "pnpm --filter=kujob-postgresql dev" "pnpm --filter=kujob-testutils dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter=kujob-core build && pnpm --filter=kujob-in-memory build && pnpm --filter=kujob-postgresql build && pnpm --filter=kujob-testutils build
